statements: DELETE FROM customer_payments WHERE id = 1;
DELETE FROM customer_payments WHERE customer_id = 100 AND payment_method = 'Credit Card';
DELETE FROM customer_payments WHERE id = 1 AND customer_id = 100

DELETE FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_amount > 500 AND transaction_status = 'success';
DELETE FROM customer_payments WHERE customer_id = 100 AND card_expiry_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_status = 'failed' AND transaction_amount > 100.00;
DELETE FROM TransactionHistory WHERE transaction_id = 1001;

DELETE FROM PaymentCards WHERE card_id = 1001;

DELETE FROM payment_details WHERE payment_amount = 1000.00
DELETE FROM customer_details WHERE customer_id = 5
DELETE FROM payment_details WHERE payment_amount > 1000.00 AND payment_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM card_details WHERE card_expiry_date < CURRENT_DATE AND customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_details WHERE email_id LIKE '%gmail.com');
DELETE FROM payment WHERE payment_id = 1001;
DELETE FROM customer WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM payment WHERE customer_id = 100 AND amount > 500.00;
DELETE FROM payment_history WHERE history_id = 10;
